channel.title: Digital Cameras on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Cameras on 0x000216

item.title: Recycle Your Cell Phones and Electronics For Cash
item.description: Probably, you have old electronics like phones, cameras, or gaming devices lying around. Instead of keeping them in a drawer, you can turn them into cash online quickly and easily. A service called uSell helps you find buyers for your old devices. It’s like those travel websites that compare prices from different companies; uSell connects you with various buyers interested in refurbishing or recycling electronics. Just enter your device’s information and condition, and uSell will show you the best cash offers from different buyers.

item.title: Cash In Old Gadgets To Buy New Gadgets
item.description: The holiday shopping season is here, and with it comes the temptation of new electronics and gadgets. However, it’s also a time to be mindful of spending. One smart solution is to turn your old electronics into cash to fund those new purchases. It’s common to have unused electronics lying around. We hesitate to discard them because they still hold value. This unused tech represents a potential savings account that can help you afford those tempting new gadgets.

item.title: WiFi in a Memory Card
item.description: You don’t often see an SD memory card with an FCC ID, but this one is special. It’s not just a 2GB memory card; it’s also a WiFi transmitter. Set it up on your computer with the included USB adapter, then put it in your camera. Now, whenever you’re within range of your home network, your pictures will automatically upload to your computer or your favorite online photo sharing site. It’s like magic!
